channel.title: Running Online Events: Lessons from GCOG
channel.description: On the Gauntlet Blog I talk about running online conventions and lessons learned from our Gauntlet Community Open Gaming events. I offer ideas, tips, and model resources. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/running-online-events-lessons-from-gcog

item.title: Running Online Events: Lessons from GCOG
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On the Gauntlet Blog I talk about running online conventions and lessons learned from our Gauntlet Community Open Gaming events. I offer ideas, tips, and model resources.

THE GAUNTLET

Running Online Events: Lessons from GCOG

​This weekend we held our fourth Gauntlet Community Open Gaming event. It’s a free online ttrpg convention aimed at new players to get them to try out online play, seeing new story games, and...

Read full topic
